snippet.title: Vestiges: Fallen Tribes - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Vestiges: Fallen Tribes early access available on Steam now !

• Wishlist the game on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2511780/Vestiges_Fallen_Tribes/?utm_source=community&utm_medium=youtube&utm_id=ea_announcement

Vestiges: Fallen Tribes is a new strategy card game set in a tribal sci-fi universe. In a world where water has become rare, lead your clan and face your opponents in strategic PvP battles and solo scenarios. Improve your deck of cards, make the right tactical decisions, and place your soldiers on the battlefield so that they take over the enemy’s battalion.

Build a powerful deck of 20 cards by combining units from your favorite tribe. Which of the Adrariis or the Illustrans will you choose to stand by ? Turn by turn, the positioning of your units will be key. Reflection will be your ally to anticipate the movements of your enemies, in this game with accessible and infinitely replayable gameplay. 

Vestiges: Fallen Tribes will be available on Steam and VR compatible for equiped players.

• Content creator call : https://forms.gle/PSUyRrGcXmEcxzHP8
• Join Discord : https://discord.gg/wanadevstudio-738367550886379592
• Vestiges: Fallen Tribes X :  https://x.com/vestiges_game
• WanadevStudio X: https://x.com/WanadevStudio  
• WanadevStudio Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063962403745
• WanadevStudio Instagram :   https://www.instagram.com/wanadevstudio/ 
• Vestiges: Fallen Tribes website : https://www.vestiges-fallen-tribes.com/

#indiegame #strategygames #vrgaming #steamgame
